article_title: Crazy Crusade To Kill Ex-Im Bank Hurts America, Helps China

article_metadata.description: If you want to understand why economic recovery from the recent recession has been so anemic, don't look at Obamacare or ozone rules -- look at the trade deficit.  Last year the huge imbalance between America's imports and exports shaved a full percentage point off economic growth; if trade had [...]
article_metadata.author: Loren Thompson
